additional_info:
Kitchen, Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, Security, Alarm System, corner, pass-through, Generator, Heating - Conditioning, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas 
 Office space for rent in Tbilisi in a prestigious office building, on Marjanishvili St. # 5 (in close proximity to Marjanishivili Theater and TBC Bank). The office space is located on the 2nd floor conveniently accessible by stairs. The office space is made up of 340 sq. meters and in addition includes 40 sq. meter balcony. Price: $17/sq. meter totaling $5,780 USD/ month equivalent in Georgian Lari. The price includes the following: 2 parking spots (additional pay parking available) 24-hour security, secured entrance video surveillance, and VAT.
